body:
* Fix unescaped braces in regexps.
Ref: https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=898994

* Apply this fix to perform thread-safe processing in code that uses the global locale.
Ref: https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=902771
title: texinfo: fix unescaped braces, and update locale handling
